Question: MCY Technology Limited CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
MCY Technology Limited

Product: MCY Moving Off Information System (MOIS) & Blind Spot Information System (BSIS)

- Intelligent AI-based driving assistance system for trucks and buses
- Designed to improve road safety and enhance indirect vision for drivers
- Meets the standard of Progressive Safe System for HGVs rated below three stars
- Enhances drivers' view of the surroundings in close proximity to the vehicle
- Exhibited at CES 2024, booth number 3156
- Email sales@mcytech.com for more information
Summary_cn:
MCY 科技有限公司

产品：MCY 移动离线信息系统（MOIS）和盲点信息系统（BSIS）

- 面向卡车和公共汽车的智能基于人工智能的驾驶辅助系统
- 旨在提高道路安全，增强驾驶员的间接视野
- 符合三星以下评级卡车的渐进安全系统标准
- 增强驾驶员对车辆周围环境的视野
- 在 CES 2024 展会上展出，展位编号 3156
- 发送电子邮件至 sales@mcytech.com 获取更多信息
